data.name: Windsor - Grand Strategy MMO
data.detailed_description:
‚ÄºÔ∏è Pre-Alpha Game ‚ÄºÔ∏è


Windsor is a persistent massively multiplayer grand strategy game currently in the very early stages of development.

It's like: Age of Empires üëë and Civilization üåé had a baby and put every player on the same map.

üëë Rule over an empire of other players. Recruit bannermen, receive tributes, and work together to conquer castles.
‚è© Plan your moves by fast-forwarding in time
‚è± Play on your own time. Wars take place over days and weeks.
‚öîÔ∏è Raise an army of different soldier types, each with different strengths and weaknesses.
üì± Check in when you're AFK - Windsor is available on your phone. Search for "Windsor Strategy" on your app store of choice

...and most-importantly, join the community helping to define what Windsor will become. Follow the link to the discord from inside the game.

data.short_description: Windsor is a massively multiplayer strategy game. Look forward or backward in time as you plan your moves to bring your kingdom to victory
